= Carousel 3D Juice Extension =

[ExtensionList Extension] to embed a revolving image carousel of clickable images in to a page.  

Author: *Richard Wallis*<br/>
Juice Version: > 0.4.3

== Operation ==

Displays a set of images in a revolving display. These images are clickable.

The extension can either be passed a set of images, their text, image source, tooltip text, and click link URL, or the URL of a an atom feed to draw these from.  See example code below - the `feedUrl` overrides any values passed as items.

== Example code ==
{{{
var html = '<div id="hpContainer" style="width: 100%; margin-right: auto; margin-left: auto; text-align: left; height: auto;"/>';
var insert = new JuiceInsert(html,"#pageContent","append");
insert.show();

$jq("#hpContainer").append('New Additons to stock');
		var carouselOpts = {
			height : "350px",
			width : "960px",
			feedUrl: "http://juice-project.s3.amazonaws.com/examples/talis-prism/sandbox-ac-carousel.atom",
			items : [
			{ src : "http://prism.talis.com/sandbox-gov/imageservice.php?id=9780596000486&size=medium",
			  label : "JavaScript : the definitive guide",
			  link : "http://prism.talis.com/sandbox-gov/items/620805"},
			{ src : "http://prism.talis.com/sandbox-gov/imageservice.php?id=9780747551003&size=medium",
			  label : "Harry Potter and the order of the Phoenix",
			  link : "http://prism.talis.com/sandbox-gov/items/642036"},
			{ src : "http://prism.talis.com/sandbox-gov/imageservice.php?id=9781846040832&size=medium",
			  label : "Fighting the banana wars and other Fairtrade battles",
			  link : "http://prism.talis.com/sandbox-gov/items/723910"}
		]
		}
	 	new Carousel3DJuice(juice,insert,"hpTop",carouselOpts);
}}}

== Prerequisites ==
=== Loaded modules ==
{{{
juice.loadJs("http://{MyServer}/extensions/Carousel3D.js");
}}}

=== Data requirements ===
None

== Constructor arguments ==
{{{Carousel3DJuice(ju,insert,targetDiv,opts)}}}

  * ju - instance of juice
  * insert - JuiceInsert for page
  * targetDiv - id of element within insert to contain control
  * opts - controlling options
